presets.name: Best Quality Vocals
presets.description: Uses BS-Roformer (viperx) for state-of-the-art vocal separation.

presets.name: Cleanest Vocals (Minimal Bleed)
presets.description: Uses Mel-Roformer Kim FT2 for cleanest possible vocals.

presets.name: Instrumental - Max Fullness
presets.description: Uses Unwa v1e+ for maximum instrumental fullness.

presets.name: Instrumental - Bleedless
presets.description: Uses Gabox Fv7z for minimal vocal bleed.

presets.name: Karaoke Separation
presets.description: Uses Anvuew karaoke model for lead/backing vocal split.

presets.name: Drums Separation (5-stem)
presets.description: Uses DrumSep for detailed drum kit separation.

presets.name: Guitar Separation
presets.description: Uses Becruily guitar model for guitar extraction.

presets.name: Denoise/Debleed
presets.description: Uses Gabox denoise model for noise/bleed removal.

presets.name: De-Reverb
presets.description: Uses Anvuew dereverb model for reverb removal.

ensembles.name: HyperACE Ultimate (Top Rated)
ensembles.description: HyperACE + Viperx 1297. Favorite ensemble per guide - best balance of fullness and clarity.

ensembles.name: v1e+ + Becruily (Best Preservation)
ensembles.description: Per guide: best instrument preservation with Max Spec blending.

ensembles.name: Gabox Bleedless (Least Noise)
ensembles.description: Gabox Fv7z + Viperx 1297. Minimal noise and vocal bleed.

ensembles.name: Resurrection Clean
ensembles.description: Resurrection inst + FT2 bleedless for clean output.

ensembles.name: Vocal Ultimate
ensembles.description: Viperx 1297 + Resurrection vocal for maximum vocal quality.
